Looking at the data again, I see that all these are "Interest Receivables" which means they represent interest that the company has earned but not yet received. For the income statement, we need to include all interest earned during the period regardless of whether it has been received yet.

The amount I've calculated, 20,059.80, represents the total interest income for the period based on all the interest receivable transactions.
